title: Calories in Gold Potatoes
meta_description: Discover calories in gold potatoes per 100 g, including carbs, protein, fiber, and full nutrition breakdown for raw Yukon Gold variety.
assumptions: Raw, unpeeled Yukon Gold potatoes; values similar to generic yellow potatoes.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by variety, size, growing conditions, and preparation method. Check labels or databases for specifics.

quick_answer.text: 100 g of raw gold potatoes contain about 74 kcal and 16 g carbs.

label_note: Values align with standard Nutrition Facts for easy label comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in 100 g gold potatoes?
faqs.a: Approximately 74 kcal for raw gold potatoes.

faqs.q: Are gold potatoes high in carbs?
faqs.a: Yes, about 16.3 g carbs per 100 g, mostly complex starches.

faqs.q: What's the protein content in gold potatoes?

faqs.a: Yes, roughly 2.1 g dietary fiber per 100 g, especially with skin.

faqs.q: How does cooking affect calories in gold potatoes?
faqs.a: Boiling may slightly reduce calories; frying or adding fats increases them significantly.
